problem.markdown:
>>Make your predictions! When I oscillate the base of my model with two SDOF systems, will the taller or shorter model move more assuming the masses are equal << ( ) The taller model will move more ( ) The shorter model will move more ( ) The two models will move the same ( ) Don't know
[explanation] Check out the next video for an explanation! [explanation]
problem.p: Make your predictions! When I oscillate the base of my model with two SDOF systems, will the taller or shorter model move more assuming the masses are equal

choicegroup.label: Make your predictions! When I oscillate the base of my model with two SDOF systems, will the taller or shorter model move more assuming the masses are equal
choicegroup.choice: The taller model will move more
The shorter model will move more
The two models will move the same

div.p: Check out the next video for an explanation!
